page.title: 16Hotels and Inns 1
page.content: {Passford House Hotel}was originally the home of Lord Arthur Cecil and stands in{9 acres}of ground.Part of the house is 400 years old and provides elegant and comfortable accommodation for its many British and overseas guests.A good year can see a total of 20,000 visitors.It is currently{3 star}rated by the A.A.and R.A.C. and has 53 bedrooms,each having telephone,radio & colour TV.The hotel is run by a staff of 55 people,6 cooks providing a high standard of cuisine. At present bed and breakfast for one night in a single room will cost Â£34. There are 4 good inns to further welcome the visitor.The{Red Lion Inn} at Boldre offers an excellent menu and is furnished with interesting antiques and agicultural items.It even has a massive man trap hung above the fireplace.
